name: Tablar
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://api.openweathermap.org/; style-src * 'self' data: 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src https://source.unsplash.com/ https://images.unsplash.com/ https://cors-anywhere.herokuapp.com/; media-src https://source.unsplash.com/; object-src 'self'
